reviews.review: Great Game

Primero: El juego base tiene muy poco contenido y al tener tantos dlcs, se siente muy vacio. No hay casi nada gratis. Ademas de que esta el pase de batalla, y como no, las skins que tambien estan bastante caras. La mayor parte del juego se paga aparte.
Segundo: Entre los errores que tiene hay muchas cosas como el sistema de rangos que anda muy mal emparejando jugadores muy buenos con otros muy malos. 
Pero lo que mas arruina la experiencia, son los comportamientos de la propia comunidad que digamos que la mayoria no son muy amigables.
It's fun.

Edit le 10/02/17 :Dead toujours by mes couilles
Mais j ai racheté des DLC (en promo) , qu on peut avoir gratos ingame dans le jeu en farmant et ca c est plutot cool.
J'y ai rejoué avec un pote, c etait sympant et toujours autant de plaisir à jouer le tueur .
J'ai été sympa, j ai mis le dernier au pied de la trappe.


Edit le 10/02/17 : Dead by Mes Couilles.
La salle d'attente porte toujours aussi bien son nom, qu'on soit 2,3 ou 4, ca dure des plombes.
Toujours pas réglé les problèmes de matchmaking, ca donne des matchs complétement déséquilibrés et tue le plaisir.
Ajoutez à cela les tueurs qui campent ou des blaireaux qui ne jouent absolument pas coop, vous avez là le merveilleux dead by daylight.
Je ne vous parlerais pas des bugs en tout genre, si malgré tout ces quelques mots vous ont conforté dans votre souhait d'acheter, vous les découvrirez bien assez vite.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



En loup solitaire, c'est pas trop mal. L'ambiance, le concept, ce jeu a un potentiel énorme.
Incarner le chasseur réveille notre côté sadique, ca tombe bien, j'ai certaines facilités en la matière.
Le point fort du jeu , c'est la coop. Enfin,il paraît.
C'est là que ca se complique, quand on tente de se lancer une partie avec les copains , mais qu'on n'est pas plus de 4, et bien ce jeu devient un simulateur de salle d'attente plutot bien foutu : 
on se fait chier pendant au moins 10 minutes , en cliquant sur prêt toutes les 20 secondes, et
pour rien du tout (et là ca devient vraiment fun).
Dieu merci, l'éditeur a prévu un succès facile à obtenir (Narcoleptic), qui se débloque en faisant 3 parties en 14 H de jeu.
Alors oui, on peut toujours créer des parties privées, à 2,3,ou 4 mais ca ne présente pas beaucoup d'intérêt.
En résumé, tant que ce problème, pourtant connu, n'est pas résolu, je ne recommande pas ce jeu.
Par contre, le titre est bien trouvé, je joue surtout en 2ème partie de soirée, et croyez moi, j'ai bien failli crever en voyant la lumière du jour.. toujours dans ma salle d'attente..

EDIT: y'a du mieux pour le matchmaking mais c'est pas encore çà.Mais le jeu est régulièrement mis à jour, on est sur la bonne voie.
Du haut de mes 11 heures de jeu, je recommande qd meme.

----------------EDIT--------------------
Quelques heures de jeu plus loin, ce qui est hyper RELOU, c'est le matchmaking.
Tu tombes contre des gars avec 4000 heures de jeu, toutes les perks à fond et là tu te sens seul au monde et tu fais chier royal.
Au lieu de te detendre, tu finis ta partie completment enervé, bref , il serait temps que l'equilibrage soit ajusté.

Funny as fuck, really is. But the worst multiplayer-system ever made. You can only search for a game for 5 seconds (yes that's right, 5 seconds), so you'll be pressing ready a whole lot, first you start a lobby with your friends, searching for a game, then you enter a second lobby. Only monsters can create the second lobby, which results in it being impossible to queue 4 friends (as survivors). This is because there's always one kid who get's in the monsterlobby as survivor or something. (Just our theory).

0 communication from the developers about the problems either.
I'd really like to recommend it but since it's pretty much unplayable if you don't soloqueue, I can't.
The que is shit
Has its ups and downs, but its a great game.
pretty fun and the devs are really active

Второго ловишь - остается 1.5 генератора. Перки на замедление прогресса починки и действий у сурвов, такое ощущение, не работают. Разработчики, вы что наделали? Раньше за выжившего было действительно интересно и сложно играть, это и тянуло играть в эту игру, а теперь полный п*****...

Ja nichts spaltet aktuell die Meinungen der DBD-Community so sehr wie das Halloween Update.

Das Spiel an sich hat mal mega Spaß gemacht, ob wohl es richtig doll verbuggt war und man ewig auf ein Match gewartet hat, doch seid kurzem wo alles die Fehler und Bugs eher die seltenheit sind und man nicht langewarten muss um eine Lobby zu finden, benehmen sich viele Spieler einfach nicht und zerstören den Spaß am Spiel auf anderem Weg.

Du hast Killer die einfach solange am Harken stehen bleiben bis du tot bist (Camper), Killer die alle tot am Boden liegen lassen und die Survivor ausbluten lassen damit sich nicht frei-gewigglen können. Das gleiche kann auch von den Survivor gemacht werden, wenn der Killer einen verfolgt an einem Guten Spot solange durch das gleiche Fenster klettern bis der Killer keinen bock mehr hat und anstatt das die Entwickler das Spiel ein wenig fairer und interessanter gestallten, patchen sie es in Grund und Boden.

Es gibt 2 Perks die einfach zu Over Powert sind (Saboteur & Iron Grasp)
Haben alle Survivor Saboteur haben sie im Hand um drehn einfach alle Harken zerstörrt und dem Killer bleibt nur sie im Keller zu bringen, da kommt Iron Grasp ins spiel hat der Killer Iron Grasp auf Stufe 3 kann er über die ganze Map mit dem Survivor über der Schulter laufen und in den Keller bringen, wenn alle oder viele Harken zerstörrt sind ist das auch Fair, aber häufig wird obwohl es noch viele andere Harken gibt, werden trotzdem gefangene Survivor in den Keller gebracht weil.... aus dem Keller kommt man kaum raus, denn der Killer kann sich weiter entfernen und sobald er sieht das jemand befreit wurde geht er zurück und kommt rechtzeitig wieder um neu zum boden zu schlagen.

Nun kommt es noch besser mit dem Halloween Update bekommen die Leute die wieder 6€ ausgeben 1 neuen Killer und 1 neuen Survivor, mit deren Perks und allem drum und dran.
D.h. gibst du nicht wieder Geld aus hast du einen nachteil im gegensatz zu denen die dies tun.
Also entwickelt sich das Spiel immer mehr und mehr in Richtung ein Spiel das Pay-to-win ist.
Und ich rate aktuell, keinem sich das Spiel zu holen!

Gruß das Kanickel

[b]Summarization: 
Bob: "Hey, you all know that experience in minesweeper, where you die the first square you click?"
Everyone: - "Yeah?"
Bob:"Let's create that game, just 1 killer, 4 survivors, and the 4 survivors will get the insta-mine feeling"
Everyone: - "Great idea, Bob"
[/b]

[b]Edit: May 22nd 2017:[/b]
Recently came back to play DbD (Well, basically just to get all perks on Dwight again). 
Newly released DLC comes with newly released bugs. Old bugs [b]still persist![/b].
It's amazing that these guys can call themselves devs, yet have no clue about the engine they're working with. I used to love the game despite the bugs, but they're ruining the experience a lot - and often. 

Private games is super fun!! No toxicity, all fun and games even despite the bugs. 
Public games are toxic as hell. Survivors will exploit any way they can (They gotta get away, no?). Killers will facecamp you if they got emotionally mad in a game meant to be fun - maybe even by just blinding them once. 

I fear for the games future, as the DLCs roll out, halffinished, absolutely not balanced and at a price one can only laugh at, as it's far too expensive for what you get. Nevertheless, i choose to buy them to gain access to the characters, no hard feelings there. The issues with the DLCs in my opinion, is the amount of bugs they bring (and amount of bugs they revive).

I tried the new killer, even before he got buffed. No perks, no items, no addons. 
Easy 20-25k points each round. As survivor i get an average of 16-17k pr. game, some better than others. 

[b]
TLDR; 
[list][*]If you play the game, go killer, it's easy as f 
[*]Still buggy, probably always will be
[*]Toxic community (on both "sides")
[*]Exploiting behaviour at any given chance (on both "sides") [/list] [/b]

A fun game that you will find wastes a few hours of your day. The gameplay is fun, if not slightly repetitive, from both killer/survivor. High replayability, given it's competitive multiplayer. However, both survivor and killer can be frustrating to play. This is *for the most part* because of a mix of bugs/exploits (see the pages of random reports on the community discussions page for specifics) that can ruin a game often enough to be annoying. The reason this does not make this review negative is because I find the game fun to play!

     The devs are hardworking and listen to their community and are actively fixing the game's problems. When the game works right, it works extremely well. When it doesn't, it's either very frustrating or very humorous. So, if you enjoy 4v1 multiplayer within a horror environment and are willing to support the devs through a somewhat-rocky launch, by all means, pick this game up and join the mass murdering fun! Many people are posting negative reveiws about this game because of numerous nitpicky complaints that really don't affect gameplay often enough to ruin the experience.

     As an example, at the very beginning of the game's launch many people posted negatives because friend-to-friend multiplayer wasn't exsistent. This was a bad move by the devs, but it was deliberate. It was deliberate because it would shift the balance of the game towards the well-coordinated teams. Though the devs openly said this, the community didn't care. So, it was implemented early with barebones funcionality because of the community's impatience. Now what do the reviews say? That it's broken and makes it too hard for killers to play. See a problem there? Again, I will repeat, if you like this genre of game and are even slightly interested and don't mind the once-in-a-while bug that are indeed being fixed as this review is being written: don't be turned away by some of the whiny negatives, this game is worth it!

人类以第三人称视角进行游戏，屠夫则已第一视角，这是为了更方便人类观察四周环境以及屠夫的操作。当前版本BUG较多，但是游戏制作公司正在不断完善，是一款不可多得的好游戏。屠夫与人类之间的强弱程度也在一次次更新中不断平衡。喜欢猫捉老鼠向的朋友务必请来尝试。

-Jogo muito bom, muito divertido! 
-Quando eu comprei o jogo, ele estava com muitos bugs mas com o tempo eles foram atualizando o jogo para amenizar os mesmos. Hoje ele apresenta alguns, mas nada que interfira a diversão COMPLETAMENTE.
-Infelizmente há alguns killers (que são o Host) que tem uma internet horrível, fazendo com que ocorra uma partida com muito laag, então o problema não é do jogo e sim dos jogadores. 
Tem como saber se a sala vai estar com muito laag... é só entrar na sala e digitar algo no chat, se demorar aparecer é porque o HOST é lixo ( então é só sair da sala e procurar outra).
-Os desenvolvedores do jogo estão cada vez mais em contato com o jogadores, como podemos perceber no fórum, todos os Bugs que foram solucionados.

 Com isso, eu super RECOMENDO o jogo!!!

After almost four years, it's still a trash game while the devs are producing more and more money-stealing DLCs. It's really fun in low rank games because players there don't know many game-breaking mechanisms. As for high-rank games? Either pallet looping or hook camping or tunneling, the game provides no other ways to win.

The game is great. Simple gameplay that doesn't get stale for a long while. 

Short description: it's a 1v4 asymmetrical survival game. There is 1 killer with a melee weapon who needs to find 4 survivors, hit them and sacrifice them to a mysterious god. The survivors can't hurt the killer, except for stunning him for a short while, they have to hide and complete objectives on the map (repair generators) to escape. They are able to save each other from death.

The game is mostly about prioritising objectives and timing your actions. There is a bit of strategy involved and some mechanical skill (in chases). The game doesn't have too many rules or complicated mechanics and therefore the learning curve is not overly steep. At lower levels, the killer will have an considerable advantage, as you start learning the game and level up your characters, the balance shifts more towards the survivor side.

The progression system in the game is quite interesting. The points you earn through playing are spent on permanent perks as well as consumable items, which change the game a little bit and help you. The perks you get introduce a significant change to the gameplay (which can excerbate matchmaking problems as levelled up characters are much stronger). It takes a long time to get all perks on multiple characters, so you will have a goal to work towards for hundreds of hours.

The game is not without bugs and problems. The matchmaking is quite bad, and there are still a few glitches around. But the involvement of the developer team is promising and makes me think all those issues will be solved in time. There have already been several patches since release addressing bugs and balance. If you have very little patience for glitches and really expect a flawless game, you may want to wait until more of the issues are solved. However, they are not preventing me from recommending this game, as I have had a LOT of fun in it.

Игра класс!

To start this i will say there are issues with the game

clicking "join a lobby" many times to get into a game (devs have said that are working on this)
matchmaking (devs have said they are testing possible fixes to this)
no key bindings (are currently being worked on and are expected soon)

and many more but even with these i still enjoy this game quite alot.  This game is done by a small team so bugs and ballance issues are to be expected but the devs are active in communication with the comunity via a weekly twitch and releasing patches quite often.

The thrill of a chase is something i have not found as good in other games as I have found in this (on both sides).  Hanging someone on a hook that you have chased for some time is quite satisfying and the flip side to this escaping someone who can track well is equally satasfying.  

When you first jump into the game you are very likely to loose either by not finding anyone or getting hooked quite quickly this is due to a in depth toutoral but then again sometimes the toutoral in games feels too long and getting your hand held the whole time is just boring.  Once you have got a feel for how the mechanics work you will start to earn more blood points (currency for leveling up and obtaining items/perks) and this will help you survive better or be a more efficient killer.

This is my first review i have written so its brobably written badly but all i can hope for is that you dont rule this game out just because of a few bad reviews.  Go watch some videos on the gameplay on twitch or somewhere else and make a decision based on what you see and what you read about the game,

Does it have bugs? Yes. Is it somewhat unstable? Sure. But is it fun?

Definitely. I quite enjoy playing this game with friends, you'll find a lot of reviews on here who simply gave the game a bad vote because "omg freidn match no worky!!!" or "killer hook camping meee!111!". The devs are actively working on all the problems people are finding, developing a game isn't as easy as tweaking some values here and there and bam it's fixed. You have to plan and plan so you don't end up fixing one thing and breaking two more. So far a whole bunch of critical bugs have been fixed, but for some people that still isn't working hard enough. Sometimes pleasing your game's players is impossible.

So for the general concept of the game and the fact that the developers stream weekly to keep us posted on all the important stuff, thumbs up!
NICE GAME

BE WARNED!!! This game has a lot of issues. Issues that for some can make this game unplayable. The servers are P2P. Which for those who don't know, instead of connecting to the GAME, you are esentially connecting to other players, which is highly unstable and often results in massive lag. In. Every. Game. You. Play. And if you are ever the killer and any lag happens... expect a lot of hate and death threats in your comments. Check my page for proof.... I play this game with friends, and when trying to join a game, instead of the lobby constantly searching for a game until it finds one, it says, "Failed to join game." and Every time that happens, each friend I play with has to press ready again. This wouldn't be a big deal if it was about 3 times we had to ready up. However, you have to do this about 20-50 times before finding a game, and sometimes if a game is found one of your friends is kicked out randomly. These are the biggest issues. It definitely feels like it should still be in alpha. There are so many problems that it hurts me because the concept is the most amazing multiplayer concept I have seen in years. 

HOWEVER!!! You probably have seen many reviews not recommending this game because of all of these issues. I will tell you. Me and my friends persevere, because it is so incredibly fun when it actually works. If you can have the patience to deal with these problems than get it... because it'll be worth it.
It is a great game, but has so many bugs. It should be better called Loading Screen Simulator 2016.
Не зацепила.

Great concept that with some more work can be a great game. The killer side of this 4v1 game is too easy, after a while you notice the same strategy is used every game (get one and wait around). The game is multiplayer but it never feels like you're actually playing with other people. You can't communicate and once one is taken they're written off (due to the strategy of the killer I mentioned).

Hopefully the devs work these kinks out! 


What it needs:

- Mic use with proximity. So if you find a survivor you can talk (but not too loudly or the killer will hear). That could add some strategy and feeling of multiplayer.

- Better methods of saving survivors once taken

Overall it's a pretty fun game, but here is the break down.

Graphics: 8/10 = Looks pretty damn good, not the most amazing in the world, but overall better than a lot from other indie companies.

Gameplay: 9/10 and 2/10 = 

~~9/10) This requires some explaining. Most matches are fun, mostly fair and pretty intense, but you usually do not feel cheated. Sometimes you're team fails you and just leaves you to die, sometimes you do the same...which is all fine and good. 

~~2/10) The matches that aren't good are...really really bad. You either end up with the wraith as the killer and it plays some intense levels of bullshit and is extremely OP; wouldn't be so bad if they either nerfed the Wraith's invisibility power, made it take longer to attack after appearing or turned off collision with the Wraith (there have been times where I have been squeezed between a generator and the Wraith when it decides to appear right next to me and I cannot flee). The Other thing that makes some matches absolute horrible is...killers that puppy guard when you're on the hook. I get that it is a tactic, but it should be a tactic they are punished for. Losing points, etc etc, because puppy guarding definitely does not please the "Entity" if hiding survivors annoy it (An update made it that if you hide too long, the "Entity" does things to reveal your location). 
~~~~Basically, this poor portion of the review would be negated if they punished killers for Guarding people on the hooks, thus negating a large portion of the Alturism tree of points for survivors. And if the Wraith recieved a major nerf on it's invisibility options. The Hillbilly can run into walls and miss entirely with the chainsaw, the Trapper's traps can be sabotaged, but nothing can fuck with the Wraith.

Overall 9/10 IF they fix some of the problems in the future.

Suggestions: Nerf the Wraith, Punish Puppy Guarding Killers with point loss or something. Or best idea of all, implement a ban system like similar games have done, where the other players can disallow specific Killers/Monsters, that way newer players are not being absolutely destroyed by the Wraith. Also, please for the love of all that is right, make it easier to get off the hooks...in my whole time playing in the beta and the official, I never once managed to get off the hook with my own power.

10/10 would die for this

This game can be very fun if you are willing to put with a screwed up match making system,  their is a ranking system yet it will match a rank 1 killer with a group of rank 20 survivors.  The killer has the option to drop his lobby and rejoin to get a more favorable match, he can see what rank/level/gear the survivors are before deciding to accept the match or not.  As a survivor you have no idea what killer you are facing let alone what rank/level they are.  

When playing with friends, I find the game will often drop you back to the main campfire lobby where you and your friends have to rejoin up and try and get into a match.  One would think after you click ready that you'd be put into a match making que and wait till your turn is up, you'd be wrong, it searchs see's no game is ready for you and unreadies you.  So you have to keep clicking ready for 1-2 minutes,  

Don't wanna take a loss just alt-f4 and quit game and no harm no foul, nothing more frustrating when a killer doesn't wanna lose points and he kills his game, you gain no points for the match he losses none.  This game has already been cracked and several different hacks for both survivors and killers that can completely ruin a match.  While this is nothing new to PC games its just frustrating when an already lopisided match gets worse because the killer is using cheats.  

So key things for this game to get a thumbs up from me,  Fix the match making system to A.) be more fluid I.E. I don't have to spam click ready for 5 minutes to get a game, and so that it doesn't randomly drop me and disband my friends group B.) Make some damn sense, don't put me in with a rank 1 killer when I'm rank 18.  C.) Stop allowing the killer to see what he's going to face so he can decided its to hard and not face it, I can't see the killer why the hell can the killer see us?



*****************************************************************************************************************
UPDATE 10/13/2016

Came back to play this game after a few months of nothing and a few thinsg have changed.  For starters they removed the ability to see everyones level at the game lobby so you don't know if you have a team of pros or a team of noobs, the killer also can't see.  Huge improvement.  

They also fixed the match making system so that you don't have to keep spam clicking the ready button click once and it puts you in a que another huge improvement.  The match making system itself still needs a little help.  I was playing as a killer and kept finding myself getting que'd against rank 12's and lower that had all the perks you'd want and well my killer is lvl 1 without any perks. Now thats not to say I didn't get a few kills in here and there but more times than not it was at the end when they were being greedy and trying to max out their points and I got lucky.  

They finally also fixed the Alt-F4 so people will no longer disconnect in a match they think will be a loss, a big bonus means people play to win and not just say fuck it and leave. When you que with friends it would be nice if after the game was done you didn't have to remake your group again.  Thats a minor annoyance, I hear people complaining that the killer is just a pushover and easy to defeat.. while I agree there are some things just frustrating. like I hook someone and go to place a trap at their feet someone can run up and get em off the hook before I can set the trap or before I can stop trying to set the trap and take a swing at em.  but all and all I find it fairly balanced, you gotta get in the head of the runner that your chancing and predict where they are going to go don't always follow the same path or try and take down every barrier they put in your way.

Мда... Я думал игра умирать начала в середине 2017г, а как вижу сейчас, то игра мертвее некуда, ибо какой-то дикий поиск игроков от 5 до 10м, если раньше помогала смена региона загрузки, то щас это не катит вообще. Игроки стали еще более ЧСВ негодяями и сильно уверенными в своих "мансах", маны стали только тупее и щас прям сильно можно их обыгрывать почти на любом ранге (кроме 1-5 ранга, там еще реально люди есть, а не то что выше стоят ху*лы продающие все).
 Перков стало просто до безобразия много, что и + и - одновременно.
1)Можно создать кого угодно
2)Слишком сильные билды на ком угодно кроме сурвов (просто нервы немного потрепят и все)
Донат по отношению СНГ очень приятный, вообще слов никаких не найти к важным минусам (кроме как P2W-Pay to win с покупкой манов и сурвов, если даже не особо хочется донатить, но потащить охота, а их перки забирайте через лет 10, когда они вообще в магазе окажутся за осколки).
Кароче, 4 объебанных K-PooP исполнительниц из 10 шизоидов с электро битой на перевес.

Игра - в которой маньяк может таскать тебя как шлюху и заставлять чинить генераторы.
Игра - в которой ты и медик, и инженер, и географ, и ясновидящий, и вообще сверхразум.
Игра - в которой вы можете зайти в лобби вчетвером, а в игру втроем.
Игра - в которой ты понимаешь, что у тебя есть талант к мансам.
Игра - в которой нет голосового общения, но все равно общаются с помощю "специальных знаков".
Игра - в которой ты можешь не зайти в лобби с десятого раза.

This game is fun, but can feel like cancer within 3-5 games. 
1) Matchmaking will match you with people higher than you all the time. Some will tell you it's part of the process, and that's only cause the had to go through it but didnt care.
2) Loading and que's can take from 1 min to an eternity. Waiting 20 min for a que is not ok, if not longer.
3) Hunter may seem to be overpowered, but that's just in your head. Just get his attention, and wall hop, back and forth 10x and see if he doesn't quit. Game may say it's geared towards the survivor, but they are lying. Survivors who waste the hunters time are the mvp's. 
4) Like 4, Survivors get a lot of cool perks to increase movement speed and heartbeat distance reaction. Why not go out of your way to get his attention and barrier hop to waste his time.
5) While you may get points if the killer quits, the game often crashes, and you lose pip's when it does... Nice
6) When can I level up when I play with my friends? No offense to the world, but I got this to have fun with friends, not hunt people, nor run from a hunter I can't even taunt, or joke with.
7) Overall this game has not improved since launch, and after reading the last patch notes, it seems they did little to help, other than to adjust certain perks for the top % of people who are at that level to use such perks.
8) If you want to get this game, honestly it will be for the long haul. If you expected it to be a pick up on occasion, then this is definately not for you!

Sadly I cannot reccomend this game. By all means its fun, But its still missing alot of balancing issues, You will not be in fair matchs (youll always be placed with ethier someone brand new or some one whom has never put down the game) But with the perk system that is really unfair to the players trying to level when constantly set against insta kill and/or wall hack esc perks. But the worst part of this is the lobbys, its lobbys are based by killer being host which always cause some lag filled game but thats only if you can connect to a lobby. My last attempt with one friend playing was readying up 97 (yes we counted) times without connecting to a single lobby.
